title: RGMan
author: RGMan
created_time: May 14, 2022, 11:54:29 AMLast edit: June 11, 2022, 03:48:42 PM by RGMan
content: OUR MISSIONWe want you to have no difficulties when you decide to buy something with crypto. We make everything simple and clear. The same rules and guarantees as in a regular marketplace, but only for those who value freedom. Cryptor.store - Pay with CryptoWHO WE ARE?Cryptor.store is a team of professionals with over 25 years of experience in e-commerce and crypto. We know exactly what a client needs from a marketplace that cares about its reputation. The quality of goods, short delivery methods, and clear rules encourage loyalty.‚úÖ The product is already ready, so we see no point in the roadmap. We will announce our intentions in stages, based on growth.‚úÖ Our concept is the union of e-commerce and blockchain. We are less dependent on the state of the crypto market. We don't work as a pyramid scheme. The larger our audience, the more real sales will be. And there will always be a market!‚úÖ If you notice, we are just starting to grow. And the first ones who were lucky enough to catch us are in the right place.‚úÖ Find information about our NFT Airdrops on social media:WHITEPAPER | WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: in what regions are you shipping your product? the price is in USD but are you accepting crypto as its equivalent? what is the assurance that the customer will receive the product and not be screwed by your site? how long are you in this e-commerce business?¬†has any customer already ordered from your marketplace?

comments.author: RGMan
comments.created_time: June 11, 2022, 03:40:58 PMLast edit: June 11, 2022, 03:53:24 PM by RGMan
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on May 29, 2022, 11:58:17 PMin what regions are you shipping your product? Now we working with USA, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, European Union. Other regions coming soon.Quote from: AmoreJaz on May 29, 2022, 11:58:17 PMthe price is in USD but are you accepting crypto as its equivalent? The price is in USD but we are accepting crypto as its equivalent, you're right. But we have system when CRYPTOR becomes a means of payment. If you understand our project a little deeper, you will be surprised :-)Quote from: AmoreJaz on May 29, 2022, 11:58:17 PMwhat is the assurance that the customer will receive the product and not be screwed by your site?We a real business. There are laws that do not allow something similar.Quote from: AmoreJaz on May 29, 2022, 11:58:17 PMhow long are you in this e-commerce business?Over 25 years.Quote from: AmoreJaz on May 29, 2022, 11:58:17 PMhas any customer already ordered from your marketplace?Yes.
